page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX][VMware Private Cloud] - Rack 31C20 incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on rack 31C20 has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 13/03/2025 15:17 UTC End time : 13/03/2025 16:03 UTC Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [RBX1a][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
incidents.message: We were experiencing an incident affecting our storage offering, which was causing temporary availability issues on the specific region RBX1a. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 07/03/2025 20:38 UTC End time: 07/03/2025 20:43 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some datastores were temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some datastores were temporarily inaccessible, the datastores hosted were also unavailable in RBX1a region. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
incidents.timestamp: Mar <var data-var='date'>12</var>, <var data-var='time'>15:23</var> - <var data-var='time'>15:23</var> UTC
